backend/main.mo: Implements Motoko canister logic for managing user profiles and food donation posts with access control and CRUD-style queries and mutations.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration handler returning an empty state during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and a custom OKLCH-based theme with light and dark mode CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router and defines routes for all main app pages wrapped in AppShell.
frontend/src/components/add-food/forms/A: Renders a card-style food donation form using validation and a createPost mutation before navigating to the NGO alert page.
Implements a drawer-based food donation form with validation, createPost mutation, and navigation after submission.
Two-step food donation form that validates input and submits a new post using useCreatePost, then navigates to /ngo-alert.
frontend/src/components/add-food/useAddF: Provides simple form validation for food donation fields and returns error messages.
Defines the main app layout with header, footer, and routed content wrapped by BottomNav.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with buttons for Home and History that update based on current route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls for creating posts and fetching user posts or tracking data using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom earth-toned color utilities for the app theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddFoodPage.tsx: Displays tabbed UI for selecting between card, wizard, or drawer variations of the add-food form.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows the user's past food posts with loading state and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen showing a welcome message, an Add Food button, and a static map image of nearby NGOs.
frontend/src/pages/NgoAlertPage.tsx: Displays latest donation alert status with conditional loading, empty, or active states and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/TrackPage.tsx: Shows tracking details for the most recent donation with loading, empty, and detailed tracking views.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, shadows, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and project configuration.
